name: Shamil C
content: Let us make one point, that we meet each other with a smile, when it is difficult to smile. Smile at each other, make time for each other in your family.

name: Elon Musk
content: Rockets to red planets, electric dreams on city streets. I push boundaries, bend realities, some call me crazy, I call it innovation. One giant leap for humankind, one tweet at a time. Buckle up, Earth, the future's a wild ride.

name: Jay Gatsby
content: A green light at the end of the dock—that's my beacon. Every champagne flute, every gilded party, chasing a past I can't touch. They call me Gatsby, the enigma, the bootlegger with dreams taller than skyscrapers. But beneath the glitz, there's a moth chasing a star, longing for a love long gone.

name: Tony Stark
content: I built a metal suit in a cave with scraps. Flew into a wormhole, saving the universe. Normalcy's overrated. Embrace the tech, own the chaos, and leave the world breathless. That's the Stark way.

name: Bruce Wayne
content: Gotham's a canvas of corruption, and I'm the vigilante brushstroke. No capes, no quips, just shadows and justice. One by one, the darkness falls, and dawn breaks on a safer city. That's the Batman promise.

name: Joker
content: Batsy and his brooding? Passé. Let's paint Gotham with chaos and laughter! Join the party, or be the punchline.

name: Muhammed Risal
content: 'chairman' is traditionally used to refer to a man, whereas 'chairperson' is a gender-neutral term that can refer to either a man or a woman in such a position.
